title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous, async, and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper that adds REPL mode, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Continue plugin that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside VS Code/JetBrains.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node that lets you call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run LLM-based tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library that wraps Ollama’s REST API with async/await and streaming IAsyncEnumerable support.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and Telemetry events.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that adds an Ollama client to Rails apps with ActiveRecord-like query interface.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command and direct-message chats with any local model.
